item.title: Java
item.dc:creator: @sdouble sdouble
item.description:
@sdouble wrote:

the jsession id messes up the link. Here are a few steps.

  1. Go here: http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
  2. Find “JDK 5.0 Update 8” and click the download button beside it.
  3. You have to accept their terms now.
  4. As KeV said, get the offline installation without netbeans. I assume you’re using Windows so it is indeed the first one.
  5. After it’s done downloading, install it.
  6. After the installation is complete, set up the environment variables (see below)

I did a search for you, since most people won’t do it themselves, and found a thread for setting these up. I didn’t look at it, but I assume it should work. After all, the thread’s name is “[tut] javac error look here” which is the error you will receive if you don’t set them correctly. Here is the link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,534.0.html

Read full topic
